mainBoard.flavorText:
"The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . . ."
—"Song of the Artificer"
mainBoard.name: Obsianus Golem

mainBoard.flavorText: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

foreignData.name: Abtrünniger Zauberer
foreignData.text: {T}: Der Abtrünnige Zauberer fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

mainBoard.name: Prodigal Sorcerer
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mainBoard.text: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

foreignData.name: Feldscher
foreignData.text: {T}:Verhindere den nächsten 1 Schadenspunkt, der in diesem Zug einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl zugefügt würde.

mainBoard.name: Samite Healer
mainBoard.originalText: ocT: Prevent the next 1 damage to target creature or player this turn.
mainBoard.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: His presence brings not only a strong arm but also renewed hope.

foreignData.name: Ehrwürdiger Mönch
foreignData.text: Wenn der Ehrwürdige Mönch ins Spiel kommt, erhältst Du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.

mainBoard.name: Venerable Monk
mainBoard.originalText: When Venerable Monk comes into play, you gain 2 life.
mainBoard.text: When this creature enters, you gain 2 life.

foreignData.name: Entzauberung
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung Deiner Wahl.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

mainBoard.name: Flight
mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Destiny, chance, fate, fortune—they're all just ways of claiming your successes without claiming your failures."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*
mainBoard.name: Hero's Resolve

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success."
—Sidar Jabari

foreignData.name: Inspiration
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler Deiner Wahl zieht zwei Karten.

mainBoard.name: Inspiration
